identificationModule.briefTitle: Serial Measurement of a Plasma Stroke Biomarker Panel in Patients Undergoing Cardiac Surgery With Cardiopulmonary Bypass
identificationModule.officialTitle: Serial Measurement of a Plasma Stroke Biomarker Panel in Patients Undergoing Cardiac Surgery With Cardiopulmonary Bypass

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this study is to investigate changes in new plasma stroke biomarker panel in patients undergoing cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass.

armGroups.label: Stroke Panel group
armGroups.description: Patients undergoing cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass

primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: day before surgery; first and second day postoperatively

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \> 18 years
* Elective cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients undergoing emergent procedures
* Patients with preoperative mechanical support
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Adult patients undergoing cardiac surgery with the use of cardiopulmonary bypass
